verses.verse: <S%H7197>Gather<s%> yourselves together, yes, <S%H7197>gather<s%> together, O <S%H1471>nation<s%> not <S%H3700>desired;<s%>

<S%H2962>Before<s%> the <S%H2706>decree<s%> <S%H3205>bring<s%> <S%H3205>forth,<s%> before the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> as the <S%H4671>chaff,<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> <S%H3808><s%> the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> on you, <S%H2962>before<s%> <S%H3808><s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> on you.

<S%H1245>Seek<s%> you the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H6035>meek<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H6466>worked<s%> his <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H6038>meekness:<s%> it <S%H194>may<s%> be you shall be <S%H5641>hid<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H639>anger.<s%>

For <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> shall be <S%H5800>forsaken,<s%> and <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation:<s%> they shall <S%H1644>drive<s%> out <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> at the <S%H6672>noon<s%> day, and <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> shall be <S%H6131>rooted<s%> up.

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2256>coast,<s%> the <S%H1471>nation<s%> of the <S%H3774>Cherethites!<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H5921>against<s%> you; O <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> I will even <S%H6>destroy<s%> you, that there shall be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3427>inhabitant.<s%>
And the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2256>coast<s%> shall be <S%H5116>dwellings<s%> and <S%H3741>cottages<s%> for <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> and <S%H1448>folds<s%> for <S%H6629>flocks.<s%>

And the <S%H2256>coast<s%> shall be for the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> they shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> thereupon: in the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> shall they <S%H7257>lie<s%> <S%H7257>down<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H6485>visit<s%> them, and <S%H7725>turn<s%> away their <S%H7622>captivity.<s%>

I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and the <S%H1421>revilings<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> they have <S%H2778>reproached<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H1431>magnified<s%> themselves <S%H5921>against<s%> their <S%H1366>border.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> as I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3588>Surely<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall be as <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> as <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> even the <S%H4476>breeding<s%> of <S%H2738>nettles,<s%> and salt <S%H4417>pits,<s%> and a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H8077>desolation:<s%> the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H962>spoil<s%> them, and the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of my <S%H1471>people<s%> shall <S%H5157>possess<s%> them.

<S%H2063>This<s%> shall they have for their <S%H1347>pride,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they have <S%H2778>reproached<s%> and <S%H1431>magnified<s%> themselves <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will be <S%H3372>terrible<s%> to them: for he will <S%H7329>famish<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and men shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> him, <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> from his <S%H4725>place,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H339>isles<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen.<s%>
You <S%H3569>Ethiopians<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> you shall be <S%H2491>slain<s%> by my <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

And he will <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H804>Assyria;<s%> and will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> and <S%H6723>dry<s%> like a <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And <S%H5739>flocks<s%> shall <S%H7257>lie<s%> <S%H7257>down<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of her, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations:<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> the <S%H6893>cormorant<s%> and the <S%H7090>bittern<s%> shall <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in the <S%H3730>upper<s%> <S%H3730>lintels<s%> of it; their <S%H6963>voice<s%> shall <S%H7891>sing<s%> in the <S%H2474>windows;<s%> <S%H2721>desolation<s%> shall be in the <S%H5592>thresholds;<s%> for he shall <S%H6168>uncover<s%> the <S%H731>cedar<s%> <S%H731>work.<s%>

<S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H5947>rejoicing<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> <S%H983>carelessly,<s%> that <S%H559>said<s%> in her <S%H3824>heart,<s%> I am, and there is <S%H657>none<s%> <S%H657>beside<s%> me: <S%H349>how<s%> is she <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation,<s%> a place for <S%H2416>beasts<s%> to <S%H4769>lie<s%> <S%H4769>down<s%> in! <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H5674>passes<s%> by her shall <S%H8319>hiss,<s%> and <S%H5128>wag<s%> his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
